title: Why does riot use inactive accounts on COOP vs BOTS?

embed.description: I think its time for Riot to stop putting all its effort into punishing people that called someone else a poopy head and tackle the real problems in league. Such as the overwhelming number of Botting accounts in Coop vs AI games.

body: So past few months I go on a game of coop vs bots and I find there is sometimes bots on my team, they are also worse than beginner bots let alone intermediate. I look at their profiles and they are real accounts just inactive. Are they accounts that have been banned? Or all just inactive? And the more important question is why?

replies.body: people bot their accounts to farm XP and IP.
